title: Elementary Advanced Biology Concept Simulation Learning Based on Cognitive Load Minimization (IMD)

context.prior_knowledge: Cell Structure, Photosynthesis, and Basic Ecosystem Concepts
context.additional_context: Career-linked learning in specialized fields (medical/technical) through VR-based virtual laboratory environments

learning_goals: Learners can replicate core life science concepts (photosynthesis, cell division) in VR simulations with over 85% accuracy
Learners can apply a four-step problem-solving process using provided information according to IMD design principles
Perform creative experimental designs three or more times while reducing cognitive load by 20%
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
